trans-unit.source: Enrich your stats, add a pie chart illustrating your carriers’ distribution.
trans-unit.target: 充實您的統計數據，添加一個餅圖來說明您的運營商分佈。

trans-unit.source: This graph represents the carrier distribution for your orders. You can also narrow the focus of the graph to display distribution for a particular order status.
trans-unit.target: 這個圖表顯示訂單使用的貨運商分佈情況，您可以將滑鼠游標移到圖片上方來顯示指定狀態的分佈

trans-unit.source: No valid orders have been received for this period.
trans-unit.target: 這個期間沒有收到任何訂單

trans-unit.source: Percentage of orders listed by carrier.
trans-unit.target: 依據貨運商列出訂單比例
